fullText:
Fey Thievery

Prerequisite: Eladrin, fey step racial power, trained in Thievery
Benefit: While your fey step is not expended, you can make a Thievery check at a range of 5 squares. If you do so, you take a -2 penalty to the check.

Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 128.
name: Fey Thievery

benefit: While your fey step is not expended, you can make a Thievery check at a range of 5 squares. If you do so, you take a -2 penalty to the check.
